oai_dc:dc.dc:title: TOTAL RATE AND DISTRIBUTION OF LONGSHORE SAND TRANSPORT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Watanabe, Akira
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sediment transport
longshore transport
transport rate
sediment distribution
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Longshore sand transport rate has been computed, for 2,520 cases covering field- and laboratory-scale conditions, using a general formula for local transport rate in a coexistent wave-current field proposed by the present author. The computed total transport rate has been well related to the alongshore component of wave power and two other parameters. Cross-shore distributions of the longshore transport rate have also been studied.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
